definition: trembling voice/see also 顫聲|颤声[chan4 sheng1]
trill (of voice)/see also 顫聲|颤声[zhan4 sheng1]
to tremble/to shiver/to shake/to vibrate/Taiwan pr. [zhan4]

sentences.english: For you, for you I am trilling these songs.
sentences.chinese: 爲你，爲你，我顫聲唱着這些詩歌。

sentences.english: She quavered an old folk song.
sentences.chinese: 顫聲唱一首古老的民謠。

sentences.english: He bleated his objections in a helpless rage.
sentences.chinese: 他怒不可遏地顫聲表示反對。

sentences.english: Severus asked with a shiver in his voice.
